name: IB哲學與實作（IB）
restrict: ◎第一階段限 國際教師學程-華語文 國際教師學程-數學 國際教師學程-物理 國際教師學程-國際◎限國際教師學程-華語文、國際教師學程-數學、國際教師學程-物理、國際教師學程-國際選修
goals: Know IB programme models, standards, and the curriculum coherence.
Demonstrate the competence in designing learning activities that are embedded with IB philosophy.
Be able to communicate and collaborate with peers within different teacher communities.
Appreciate how teaching and learning are done in IB schools and reflect to their own instruction.
Construct several unit plans which allow students to inquire knowledge independently.
syllabus:
**NOTICE:**

1\. Capacity of IB Philosophy and Practices Course is with NO EXCEEDING TO 35 LEARNERS. NO DISTRIBUTION OF EXTRA AUTORIZATION. If you failed to sign up successfully within the 1st & 2nd registration stages, please log in the system periodically for any vacancies of possible withdrawing.

2\. All course takers (including provisional signups) MUST SHOW THE PRESENCE in the 1st class. Absence will be regarded as a DROP OF COURSE.

3\. A REQUIRED one-day workshop will be held on NOV. 06. Please consider signup for the next term if you are not able to fully attend.

**Course Description:**

This course engages pre-service teachers to explore contemporary educational theories and IB education pedagogy. Course sessions introduce perspectives and approaches to develop school-aged students “inquiring, knowledgeable and caring young people” and “active, compassionate and lifelong learners.” To ensure that pre-service teachers acquire both theoretical and practical sense of IB education, the course invites IB practitioners (experienced teachers) to share their experiences and engage pre-service teachers to critically reflect on related educational issues.

**Pre-requisites, Co-requisites and Prohibited Combination**

This course is a required course for four IBEC programs at NTNU.

**Course Credits / Course Requirements**

This is a 3-credit course. To preview the assigned reading is required, since each session extensively engage pre-service teachers to discuss or complete tasks. The in-class activities are set as group work, which include in-class discussions and design of instructional plans. Individual work requires each pre-service teacher to write a “Theory and Praxis of IB philosophy” essay and reflective learning journals on workshops.

**Class Meetings**

1\. Introduction: Course Outline and Learning Framework

2. Topic: IB philosophy, Mission Statement and Learner Profile

3. Topic: Program Models & IB Standards and Practices

4. Activity: School Visit

5\. Topic: International Mindedness

6. Topic: Conceptual Understanding and Contextual Learning

7\. Workshop: DP Theory of Knowledge

8. Topic: Approaches to Learning and Approaches to Teaching

9. Activity: IB Teacher Images & School Visit

10. Topic: Link Assessment Objectives and Criteria to Formative Assessment and Inclusion

11\. Topic: MYP Interdisciplinary Teaching and Learning 1 ? INQUIRY: Establishing the purpose of the unit

12\. Topic: MYP Interdisciplinary Teaching and Learning 2 ? INQUIRY: Statement of inquiry, Inquiry questions, Objectives, Summative Assessments and ATL

13\. Topic: MYP Interdisciplinary Teaching and Learning 3 - ACTION: Teaching and learning through inquiry

14\. Workshop: CAS, Projects & EE

15. Activity: Final Presentation (with peer feedback)

16. Activity: Final Presentation (with peer feedback)

17\. & 18. Self-directed Learning & REFLECTION - Considering the planning, process and impact of the inquiry

> 1\. 本課程修習人數上限35人，為維持修課品質，恕不發放授權碼。未選課成功者可隨時留意系統退選空缺。
> 
> 2\. 第一堂課所有修課同學務必出席，欲加選者亦同。
> 
> 3\. 本學期工作坊謹訂於11/6（六）一日舉行，修課同學務必出席，未能出席者請考量下學期再修課。

**本學期課程包含以下主題 (非週次)。另有一日工作坊與實地參訪活動：**

1\. IB哲學、宗旨與學習者檔案

2\. IB課程模組、規準與實踐

3\. 國際情懷

4\. 概念驅動的理解與學習

5\. 知識理論

6\. 學習法與教學法 

7\. 教師圖像

8\. 連結評量目標與形成性評量

9\. MYP跨學科課程與教學：探究 - 教學目標

10\. MYP跨學科課程與教學：探究 - 探究問題、總結性評量與學習設計

11. MYP跨學科課程與教學：行動 - 探究的教與學

12.  創意活動服務，專案和擴展性論文

13\. 期末報告與同儕互評

14\. 自主學習與反思
